attributes.action: Voice opposition to scheduled execution of Saddam Hussen's brother and Judge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the humiliating and upsetting manner of Saddam Husseins execution I believe the PM should strongly voice an oppsoition to any scheduled execution of Saddams brother or judge. Although these men have commited grave crimes a life sentence is a more fitting punishment.
